column4: I need a bit of help getting ndiswrapper and my wifi going. The driver seems to be up and running ok, and iwlist wlan0 scanning detects the AP, but if I try to connect I get stuff like: received packet has bogus ESSID and it never gets dhcp, any help?
did you enter a security key?
I have the wep off for now, until I get it working
i'm doing way too many things at one
I got ndiswrapper setup and it seems to be ok, but when I try to connect I get stuff in dmesg like: "received packet has bogus ESSID" and it won't dhcp
my wireless card has worked once and then it quits working
I'm a little far from the ap, but I get a full connection when in windows.
el cheapo airlink card, texas instr acx
I've had it working with ndis before, but it's been a while and I don't remember if I had to do anything sepcial.
i have broadcom and it worked until i did any package upgrading in dapper
so I'm sol and stuck with windows?
i have no clue, never used ndiswrapper, someone else might know
would it make sense for the signal to be stronger in windows than linux, and not good enough for a connection in *nix?
